name: places/ChIJWRW-pL5ZwokRW6XJ4RfxXj0
adrFormatAddress: 166 8th Ave, New York, NY 10011-5107, USA

editorialSummary.text: Established pet store selling pure-bred puppies, as well as dog food, toys & accessories.

originalText.text: We had a great experience getting our puppy from Citipups! The staff made everything easy, fast, and comfortable. After we got Norman home, we got weekly texts checking up on him. Norman is a happy sweet boy! We couldn’t be happier, thank you!!!!

text.text: We had a great experience getting our puppy from Citipups! The staff made everything easy, fast, and comfortable. After we got Norman home, we got weekly texts checking up on him. Norman is a happy sweet boy! We couldn’t be happier, thank you!!!!

originalText.text: I recently had to put one of my Chihuahuas to sleep due to kidney failure.  During the same week, I met my little Daisy at Citipups Lexington Avenue store. She was a tiny, beautiful long hair Chihuahua puppy with one blue and one green eyes, weighing 1 and half lbs.  She was just one of the most beautiful Chihuahua puppies I’ve ever seen. It was definitely love at first sight for me and I could not resist but to take her home. My whole experience at Citipups has been amazing. Staff are very friendly and accommodating and Citipups staff followed up with me weekly to see how she is doing and how she is adjusting to her new home. My puppy is in perfect health and always very happy. She loves all the toys that I bought for her and getting along great with my other long hair Chihuahua, Trixie. It’s been 2 and half months and she is growing to be a very happy dog.

originalText.text: I got my adorable Shih Tzu puppy in late September 2023 and I couldn’t be happier! His name is Milo Gizmo and he’s honestly the sweetest. He’s very friendly, active, healthy and loving. The process at Citipups was seamless and they even check up on you for a month to see how everything is going with the puppy as well as you get a free vet visit with the purchase of the puppy! 10/10 recommend

text.text: I got my adorable Shih Tzu puppy in late September 2023 and I couldn’t be happier! His name is Milo Gizmo and he’s honestly the sweetest. He’s very friendly, active, healthy and loving. The process at Citipups was seamless and they even check up on you for a month to see how everything is going with the puppy as well as you get a free vet visit with the purchase of the puppy! 10/10 recommend

originalText.text: Amazing experience getting my adorable puppy. Such a clean and reputable place, the staff exceeded my expectations and were the most caring and supportive. Everything was clearly explained in detail and the gentleman helping me gave me his phone number just incase of emergencies or if I had any question. He made me felt at ease that CitiPups would be there for us during the puppy’s transition to his new home. They followed up with me 3 separate times, checking in to see how the puppy was doing and if I had any questions. Overall amazing place to get your puppy!

Everything was clearly explained in detail and the gentleman helping me gave me his phone number just incase of emergencies or if I had any question. They followed up with me 3 separate times, checking in to see how the puppy was doing and if I had any questions. Overall amazing place to get your puppy!

originalText.text: This review is very overdue. We got our F1 mini goldendoodle from Citipups Chelsea. We would highly recommend Citipups after our experience. We got to play with our puppy in the puppy playpen and we were not rushed at all. After we got our puppy, Citipups guaranteed her health and said they would pay for any vet bills if she got any illnesses within the first two weeks. They were better than most breeders we had heard of. If we were to get another puppy again, we would definitely do it with Citipups. Citipups also estimated our dog’s full grown weight to be 20-25 lbs and she ended up at 23 lbs. We did genetic testing and it matched exactly what Citipups told us she was.
